--- title: "Field Experiments I" date: "March 8, 2023" format: html --- ## Overview The next two weeks are about field experiments, also known as randomized controlled trials (RCTs) or A/B testing. These are experiments aimed testing the impact of a policy intervention. [CONTINUE HERE SO MANY VARIANTS. ALSO ONLY FOCUS ON THE DESIGN FOR THE LONG TERM PROGRAM READING] ## Reading - [{{< fa book >}}]{style="color: #ac1455;"} [RD section 18](https://book.declaredesign.org/experimental-causal.html) - Bowers, Jake, and Paul F. Testa. 2019. [“Better Government, Better Science: The Promise of and Challenges Facing the Evidence-Informed Policy Movement.”](https://doi.org/10.1146/annurev-polisci-050517-124041) *Annual Review of Political Science* 22: 521-542 ## Slides ::: {.callout-tip} ## Navigation Click on the frame below and use the arrows to navigate.
